value.title: Artificial Intelligence will transform Indian Economy
value.excerpt: New Delhi: The government is hopeful that India's artificial intelligence (AI) programme is likely to be a kinetic enabler for India to achieve the goal of a $1-trillion digital economy by 2026. Besides, the country’s AI programme will also focus on comprehensive skills in the country and building computer infrastructure among others.
